_meta.description: UPLB Room Information Database - Directions and Details
_meta.notes: Coordinates left blank for future mapping. Directions compiled from various sources.

Physical Sciences Building.description: Main building for physical sciences, located right of Oblation statue
Physical Sciences Building.general_directions: From the main gate, walk towards the Oblation statue. The Physical Sciences Building is the wide building to the right of Oble. You should see the sign 'Francisco O. Santos Hall'.

CAS Building.description: College of Arts and Sciences main building, behind Oblation statue
CAS Building.general_directions: Located directly behind the Oblation statue. Walk up the Humanities steps (hum steps) from Oble. The basement rooms are accessible from the ground floor.

CAS Annex 1.description: Four-story building to the left of Oblation, near OUR
CAS Annex 1.general_directions: From Oblation, turn left. CAS Annex 1 is the tall four-story building beside the Office of the University Registrar (OUR). It's also near the ruins.

CAS Annex 2.general_directions: Located across from the Office of the University Registrar. The Multi-Purpose Hall (MPH) is on the first floor, near the side facing the ruins.

E.B. Copeland Gymnasium.description: Main gymnasium with lecture rooms on upper floors
E.B. Copeland Gymnasium.general_directions: Located across from the Raymundo Gate. Has multiple floors with lecture rooms. Wing B is towards the parking area at the back.

Math Building.description: Institute of Mathematical Sciences and Physics building
Math Building.general_directions: From Physical Sciences Building, take the path behind towards the Nutrition/CHE buildings area. The Math Building is across from St. Therese church area.

Biological Sciences Building.general_directions: Located in front of CAS Annex 1 and to the left of SEARCA. Near the BioSci area past the CAS buildings.

Institute of Computer Science.description: Part of the Physical Sciences complex
Institute of Computer Science.general_directions: Located within the Physical Sciences Building complex. ICS offices and PC labs are on various floors.

CEAT Building.description: College of Engineering and Agro-Industrial Technology
CEAT Building.general_directions: Located in the engineering area of the campus.

aliases: College of Public Affairs and Development
ICoPED Building.description: Institute for Governance and Rural Development
ICoPED Building.general_directions: Located across from Raymundo Gate, near E.B. Copeland Gymnasium. About 400 meters from BioSci.

aliases: School of Environmental Science and Management
SESAM Building.general_directions: Located past CAS Annex area. BioSci is past SESAM.

NCAS Building.description: Agriculture studies building, known for good CR on 4th floor
NCAS Building.general_directions: Located in the agriculture complex area.

DevCom Building.description: College of Development Communication, near Carabao Park
DevCom Building.general_directions: Located near Carabao Park (C-Park), which is the first area you see from the main gate with carabao statues. DevCom people usually hang out here.

Student Union Building.description: Student services building with billiards and bowling in basement
Student Union Building.general_directions: Has offices on second floor, billiards and bowling in basement. Printing services available at the far end.

D.L. Umali Hall.description: Main auditorium for events like Isko't Iska
D.L. Umali Hall.general_directions: Located near Freedom Park (F-Park). Below DL Umali Hall is an art gallery with occasional exhibits.

Main Library.description: Main campus library with Pegaraw statue in front
Main Library.general_directions: Has the Pegaraw statue (winged tamaraw) in front. The Infinity Bridge (Never-Ending Bridge) is behind it, leading to the Forestry area.

Carillion.general_directions: The tallest building located in Freedom Park (F-Park).

Baker Hall.description: Historic building with rumored WW2 tunnels underneath
Baker Hall.general_directions: Historic building. Legend says there are tunnels underneath that were used during WW2.

CHE Building.description: College of Human Ecology and Nutrition programs
CHE Building.general_directions: Located behind Physical Sciences Building, in the area near UPF and the Nutrition buildings.

HFDS Building.general_directions: The Annex Lecture Hall is in this building. Can shortcut from Physical Sciences Building through the back path.

ICropS Building.description: Institute of Crop Science with Gonzales Wing
ICropS Building.general_directions: ICropS 200 Gonzales Wing is on the 2nd floor.

PSLH 1.directions: Located in the Physical Sciences Building ground floor area.

PSLH 2.directions: Located in the Physical Sciences Building ground floor area.

PSLH 3.directions: Located in the Physical Sciences Building ground floor area.

PSLH 4.directions: Now renamed to Manuel M. Manuel Lecture Hall (MMMLH). From the front entrance of the Physical Sciences Building, climb to the third floor until you see the Institute of Statistics. The lecture hall is nearby.

MMMLH.directions: Previously known as PSLH 4. From the front entrance of the Physical Sciences Building, climb to the third floor until you see the Institute of Statistics. The lecture hall is on this floor.

ICSMH.directions: Located on the 2nd floor of the Physical Sciences Building (PhySci). Go to the ICS area and look for the Mega Hall.

ICSLH 1.directions: In the ICS area of the Physical Sciences Building.

ICSLH 2.directions: In the ICS area of the Physical Sciences Building.

ICSLH 3.directions: In the ICS area of the Physical Sciences Building.

ICSLH 4.directions: In the ICS area of the Physical Sciences Building. This is where ICS classes are commonly held.

ICS PC1.directions: One of the ICS PC labs (PSC - PC labs) in the Physical Sciences Building. Ask ICS staff for specific location.

ICS PC2.directions: One of the ICS PC labs in the Physical Sciences Building.

ICS PC3.directions: One of the ICS PC labs in the Physical Sciences Building.

ICS PC4.directions: One of the ICS PC labs in the Physical Sciences Building.

ICS PC5.directions: One of the ICS PC labs in the Physical Sciences Building.

ICS PC6.directions: One of the ICS PC labs in the Physical Sciences Building.

ICS PC7.directions: One of the ICS PC labs in the Physical Sciences Building.

ICS PC8.directions: One of the ICS PC labs in the Physical Sciences Building.

ICS PC9.directions: One of the ICS PC labs in the Physical Sciences Building.

MB 100.directions: Ground floor of the Math Building (IMSP). The building is behind PhySci, across from St. Therese area.

MB 101A.directions: First floor of the Math Building. Take the shortcut from PhySci through the back (via Nutri/CHE area near UPF).

MB 101B.directions: First floor of the Math Building, adjacent to 101A.

MB 102.directions: First floor of the Math Building.

MB 103A.directions: First floor of the Math Building.

MB 104.directions: First floor of the Math Building.

MB 301.directions: Third floor of the Math Building. The first digit (3) indicates the floor number.

MB 302.directions: Third floor of the Math Building.

MB 303.directions: Third floor of the Math Building.

MB 304.directions: Third floor of the Math Building.

MB 305.directions: Third floor of the Math Building.

MB 307.directions: Third floor of the Math Building.

MB 308.directions: Third floor of the Math Building.

MB 309.directions: Third floor of the Math Building.

MBBLH.directions: The main large lecture hall in the Math Building (IMSP).

PSLH A.directions: Enter the Physical Sciences Building from the main entrance facing Oblation. The lecture halls are on the ground floor and are well-marked.

PSLH Aa.full_name: Physical Sciences Lecture Hall A (Part A)
PSLH Aa.directions: A subdivision of PSLH A when the hall is divided. Same location as PSLH A.

PSLH Ab.full_name: Physical Sciences Lecture Hall A (Part B)
PSLH Ab.directions: A subdivision of PSLH A when the hall is divided. Same location as PSLH A.

PSLH B.directions: Enter the Physical Sciences Building from the main entrance. PSLH B is adjacent to PSLH A on the ground floor.

PSLH-A.directions: Same as PSLH A. Enter PhySci from the main entrance facing Oblation.

PS B-200.directions: Room B-200 in the Physical Sciences Building, 2nd floor. Rooms here are easy to spot with clear signage.

PS C-100.directions: Room C-100 in the Physical Sciences Building.

CAS B05.directions: Located in the basement of the CAS Building (behind Oblation, formerly Humanities Building). B = Basement.

CAS B08.directions: Located in the basement of the CAS Building. B = Basement.

CAS A1 306.directions: CAS Annex 1 is the tall building to the left of Oblation, beside OUR. Go to the 3rd floor and find room 306.

CAS A1 GAL1.directions: Located in CAS Annex 1, ground floor area.

CAS A2 202.directions: CAS Annex 2 is across from the registrar. Room 202 is on the 2nd floor. First digit indicates floor.

CAS A2 MPH1.directions: Located in CAS Annex 2 (across from registrar), first floor. Near the side facing the ruins.

BS C-125.directions: BioSci buildings are in front of CAS A1 and left of SEARCA. Find room C-125 in the complex.

IBSLH Main.directions: The main lecture hall in the Institute of Biological Sciences building.

ORHS 103.directions: Located in the Old Math Building, which is across from St. Therese church.

LR1-EB GYM.full_name: Lecture Room 1, E.B. Copeland Gym Wing 2
LR1-EB GYM.directions: Lecture Room 1 in Wing 2 of Copeland Gymnasium. The gym is across from Raymundo Gate. Wing 2 has the lecture rooms.

Wing B, 3rd FL, Lecture Room 3A.full_name: Copeland Gymnasium Wing B, 3rd Floor, Lecture Room 3A
Wing B, 3rd FL, Lecture Room 3A.directions: Copeland Gym has a 3rd floor. Wing B is towards the parking area at the back of Copeland. HK 11 classes are often held here.

Annex Lecture Hall.directions: The Annex Lecture Hall in the HFDS area. You can shortcut from Physical Sciences Building if coming from Chemistry labs.

ICropS 200 Gonzales Wing 2nd Floor.directions: Located in the Gonzales Wing of the ICropS Building, 2nd floor.

ICSLH.meaning: Institute of Computer Science Lecture Hall

PS.floor_hint: First number often indicates floor (e.g., B-200 = 2nd floor)

CAS A1.floor_hint: First digit of room number = floor

CAS A2.floor_hint: First digit of room number = floor

MB.floor_hint: First digit of room number = floor (e.g., 302 = 3rd floor)

tips: Room numbers often encode the floor: first digit = floor number (e.g., 302 = 3rd floor, 101 = 1st floor)
B prefix usually means Basement (e.g., CAS B05 = CAS Basement Room 05)
When lost, don't hesitate to ask students or staff - you only need to do it once!
ICS-related rooms (ICSLH, ICSMH, ICS PC) are all in the Physical Sciences Building
PSLH = Physical Sciences Lecture Hall, always in PhySci building
There's a shortcut from PhySci to Math Building through the back (via Nutri/CHE area near UPF)
Copeland Gym has multiple floors with lecture rooms - Wing B is at the back near parking
CAS Building is behind Oblation, also called Humanities Building
